resources.string:
Tap the tiles randomly to reveal the picture it contains. 

If two tiles tapped consecutively do not have the same picture, they get closed back but if they have the same picture they remain open. 

For every two taps, the number of moves increase by one. 

Try to match all the tiles with as few moves possible.

You can create your own special tiles with the pictures you like. 

Just select 4 x 2, 6 x 3 or 6 x 4 and choose your desired pictures.

Custom games created are saved remotely on the internet and can be downloaded and played by others too.

You can download and play custom games created by others as well.
You can download custom piqtiles game board you previously created. \n\nJust type the name of the game and tap ok.
